abstract: The announcement is a blow to a program that had been seen as the most successful in commercial aviation — a perfect blend of technology, marketing and production line innovations.
snippet: The announcement is a blow to a program that had been seen as the most successful in commercial aviation — a perfect blend of technology, marketing and production line innovations.
lead_paragraph: The Boeing Company’s announcement yesterday that it would delay initial deliveries of the 787 Dreamliner by six months is a blow to a program that had been seen as the most successful in commercial aviation — a seemingly perfect blend of new technology, marketing and production line innovations.

headline.main: Boeing Is Delaying Delivery of Its 787
headline.print_headline: Boeing Is Delaying Delivery of Its 787
